casebody.data:
BOBBITT
v.
SAFRIT., et al. No. 667PA03-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 24, 2015.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of November 2015 by State of NC to Withdraw the Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of November 2015."
